name: Aebecee's Raging Typhoon Armor
description: When you put it on, this armor gives you an impulse and makes you sense a strong wind.

name: Aebecee's Raging Typhoon Armor [1]
description: When you put it on, this armor gives you an impulse and makes you sense a strong wind.

name: After Christmas
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. [Every mortal being has to face death. Now the mummy has learned a new dance, so the dead country has quite a thriving art market.]

name: Agate
description: This gem carries a flaming glow and is a material used for making accessories.

name: Agate Clip
description: A small clip used to hold hair , with a red ruby embedded in it.
effect: Max SP ＋150,SP costs of skill use -5%

name: Agate Clip [1]
description: A small clip used to hold hair , with a red ruby embedded in it.
effect: Max SP ＋150,SP costs of skill use -5%

name: Agent Katar [1]
description: The Katars that can hit the target perfectly even in emergencies is widely loved by Assassins. It is said that the luck will be focused on the user to increase the hit rate.

name: Agent Katar [2]
description: The Katars that can hit the target perfectly even in emergencies is widely loved by Assassins. It is said that the luck will be focused on the user to increase the hit rate.

name: Agi Meal A
description: Scorpion is one of the four special dishes in Sograt Desert, which is said to be cooked with the hot air of the desert. AGI ＋5, Attack Spd ＋10%, This effect lasts 30 minutes.

name: Agi Meal B
description: Scorpion is one of the four special dishes in Sograt Desert, which is said to be cooked with the hot air of the desert. AGI ＋10, Attack Spd ＋20%, This effect lasts 30 minutes.

name: AGI Pin
description: It looks like a beautiful pin, but it's a special item made by the Elves for holy war. It's small and easy to keep, and it enhances agility.

name: AGI Pin [1]
description: It looks like a beautiful pin, but it's a special item made by the Elves for holy war. It's small and easy to keep, and it enhances agility.

name: Air of the other world
description: Rift of the other world begins to expand. Its air is the first to come through!

name: Airship Captain Hat [1] Blueprint
description: Airship captain's hat. There's a small line wrote on the hat's brim, "please let me become a doctor".

name: Al De Baran Adventure Chest
description: Open the box, you will certainly receive some Colorful Shell, with a probability to receive Time Twister, Key of Clock Tower, Dragon Scale, Crystal Mirror, Rose Quartz, Glitter Shell, Memory Gem, Pet EXP Potion (S), Pet EXP Potion (M), Pet EXP Potion (L), etc.

name: Al De Baran Artifact token
description: Reward for the Guardians of Al De Baran 1, use to redeem Artifact shards of Axe and Dagger

name: Alberta
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. ['There is a legend in the famous merchant country: giant gold insects are existing somewhere in the mainland, which may be a good chance to make a windfall.' Do you believe in this legend?]
